settings.title: Kiana Basu Sanchez, Senior Director, eCommerce
settings.desc: “My favorite winter family tradition is hate watching really cheesy, low-budget, made-for-TV (or Netflix) holiday movies. We start after Thanksgiving Dinner every year and don’t stop until New Year’s! We intermix legitimately good holiday classics, but the bad ones are a real guilty pleasure.”

settings.title: Janelle Collins, Project Manager, Global eCommerce
settings.text_center: “My favorite family tradition is going on a weekend cabin trip somewhere in our surrounding mountain area in California. Whether it’s Big Bear, Lake Arrowhead or Mammoth, I can’t pass up homecooked meals, board games, movies and snow time with the family. The perfect getaway getting a new scenery while staying semi local.”

settings.title: Kristin Petakoff Senior Manager, eCommerce
settings.text_center: “The best tradition is baking sugar cookies! Using fun cookie cutters, decorating with frosting and sprinkles, and, of course, eating them!”

settings.caption: Rose Inc Blush Divine Clean Dewy Cream Blush
Peace Out Salicylic Acid Acne Healing Dots
Biossance Squalane + Marine Algae Eye Cream
Rose Inc Softlight Clean Dewy Hydrating Concealer
Summer Fridays Lip Butter Balm

settings.title: Rhonda Ruf, National Education & Events Manager
settings.desc: “I am the youngest of five children, so getting together for the holidays is always so much fun! Food has always been the center of any holiday celebration. While my mom and I usually do the cooking, the entire family is always in the kitchen trying steal a bite of food when they can. Lots of laughs and quality time together. This year will be extra special as we are expecting a new member to join the family!”

settings.title: Marielle Sales, Production Manager
settings.text_center: “My favorite winter family tradition is cooking a holiday feast together. Christmas is a big holiday for Filipinos, and on Christmas Eve, called Noche Buena, we typically have a midnight meal. This year, I’m looking forward to sharing my ube pie recipe and teaching my mom how to make it.”

settings.title: Kacie Friedman, Global Director, PR & Communications
settings.text_center: “I’m Catholic and Jewish, so my family enjoys the best of both worlds during the holidays. My favorite tradition is our Christmas Eve — all our Jewish friends come over for a non-traditional feast of the seven fishes with sushi. On Christmas day, my family enjoys a Jewish Christmas — Knicks game or movie during the day, and Chinese food for dinner.”

settings.caption: Rose Inc Skin Resolution Clean Exfoliating Acid Toner
Caudalie Grape Water Moisturizing Face Mist
Laneige Lip Sleeping Mask
Rose Inc Blush Divine Clean Dewy Cream Blush
Rose Inc. Number 2 Brush
Shiseido Eyelash Curler

settings.title: Verity Pemberton, Senior Director, Creative
settings.desc: “On Boxing Day, my family and I head to the local park and split into two teams to play Capture the Flag. It is super fun and by the end, we are normally exhausted and ready to head home for our second round of Christmas dinner.”

settings.title: Adrian Cabrero, Director, Digital Creative
settings.text_center: “My tradition is making our home as cozy as possible with decorations, a Christmas tree, warm drinks, fires in the fireplace, wearing a robe as much as possible and thick socks. Anything to counter cold winter nights makes me happy.”

settings.title: Kathryn Bonham, Copy Writer
settings.text_center: “After my siblings and I grew up, my family stopped giving gifts. But every year, without fail, we end up doing an unplanned-yet-unsurprising gift exchange.”

settings.caption: Rose Inc Modern Essentials Clean Color Gift Set
Beauty Speak Love Glossy Lip Treatment

Eadem Milk Marvel Dark Spot Serum
Sephora Favorites Black-Owned Beauty Set
Rose Inc Radiant Reveal Serum
Topicals Like Butter Mask

settings.title: MacKenzie Kassab, Director, Copywriter and Editor
settings.desc: “Nights in are always better in winter. We count down each night before the holidays with a classic Christmas movie and bourbon, neat. Christmas in Connecticut and The Shop Around the Corner are always at the top of my list.”
